mapper.select: SELECT oymbSeq , oymbId , oymbPassword , oymbDesc , oymbName FROM oyMember WHERE 1=1 AND oymbId=#{oymbId} AND oymbPassword=#{oymbPassword}
SELECT oycdSeq , oycdName , oycgSeq FROM oyCode WHERE 1=1 AND oycdDelNy = 0 AND oycdUseNy = 1
SELECT oyctSeq , oyctName , oyctParents , oyctDepth , oyctOrder FROM oyCate WHERE 1=1 AND oyctDelNy = 0 AND oyctUseNy = 1
